short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension to perform various operations using OpenAI or Azure OpenAI Service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: br1efly is a Chrome extension that uses OpenAI or Azure OpenAI Service for selected text to easily perform summarization, translation, and data structure transformation from a context menu.
